metadata.scanner: Multi-Agent Code Perfection System - Scout Phase

issues.description: Bare except clause catches all exceptions indiscriminately
issues.impact: May hide bugs and make debugging difficult
issues.suggested_fix: Replace 'except:' with specific exception types like 'except Exception as e:'

issues.description: Multiple bare except clauses (3 occurrences)
issues.impact: Suppresses error information needed for troubleshooting
issues.suggested_fix: Use specific exception handling and logging

issues.description: Missing docstrings on 16 functions and classes
issues.impact: Reduces code maintainability and developer experience
issues.suggested_fix: Add comprehensive docstrings following Google or NumPy style

issues.location: Root directory: backup-manager.py, readme-generator.py, script-generator.py, wiki-generator.py
issues.description: Python files using hyphens instead of underscores
issues.impact: Non-Pythonic naming convention makes imports awkward
issues.suggested_fix: Rename to backup_manager.py, readme_generator.py, script_generator.py, wiki_generator.py

issues.description: Extensive use of print() instead of logging
issues.impact: Reduces log management flexibility and filtering capabilities
issues.suggested_fix: Use logger.info(), logger.debug() etc. for better log control

issues.location: script-generator.py (1337 lines), wiki-generator.py (1014 lines), readme-generator.py (722 lines)
issues.description: Very large files indicating monolithic design
issues.impact: Reduces maintainability, testability, and code reuse
issues.suggested_fix: Refactor into smaller, focused modules with single responsibilities

issues.description: 6 TODO comments indicating incomplete functionality
issues.impact: Web API endpoints not fully implemented (config updates, script generation, backup operations, settings)
issues.suggested_fix: Implement missing functionality or remove placeholder endpoints

issues.description: subprocess.run without input validation
issues.impact: Potential command injection if inputs are not sanitized
issues.suggested_fix: Add input validation and use subprocess arguments safely

issues.description: Inconsistent import ordering and grouping
issues.impact: Reduces code readability and maintainability
issues.suggested_fix: Use isort or black for consistent import formatting

issues.description: 3 print() statements in web application
issues.impact: Debug output not suitable for production web server
issues.suggested_fix: Replace with logger calls

issues.description: PowerShell function uses emoji in output (✓)
issues.impact: Inconsistent with ASCII-only mandate, may cause alignment issues
issues.suggested_fix: Replace ✓ with [OK] or [*] for consistency

issues.description: PowerShell function uses emoji in output (✗)
issues.impact: Inconsistent with ASCII-only mandate
issues.suggested_fix: Replace ✗ with [FAIL] or [X] for consistency

issues.description: No CSRF protection for Flask application
issues.impact: Vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks
issues.suggested_fix: Add Flask-WTF with CSRFProtect() or implement CSRF tokens manually

issues.description: Missing input validation on POST endpoints
issues.impact: Potential for injection attacks and malformed data processing
issues.suggested_fix: Add input validation using marshmallow or pydantic schemas

issues.description: No rate limiting on API endpoints
issues.impact: Vulnerable to DoS attacks and API abuse
issues.suggested_fix: Implement Flask-Limiter or similar rate limiting

issues.description: Missing security headers (CSP, X-Frame-Options, etc.)
issues.impact: Vulnerable to clickjacking and XSS attacks
issues.suggested_fix: Add Flask-Talisman or set security headers manually

issues.description: Low test coverage: only 3 test files for 19 source modules
issues.impact: High risk of regressions and bugs in production
issues.suggested_fix: Add comprehensive unit and integration tests targeting >80% coverage

issues.description: No PowerShell tests using Pester framework
issues.impact: PowerShell scripts not tested, may break on different Windows versions
issues.suggested_fix: Add Pester tests for all PowerShell scripts

issues.description: No web interface tests (E2E or integration)
issues.impact: Web UI changes may break functionality without detection
issues.suggested_fix: Add Selenium or Playwright tests for web interface

issues.description: No ARIA labels on interactive elements
issues.impact: Screen readers cannot properly announce UI elements
issues.suggested_fix: Add aria-label, aria-describedby attributes to buttons, forms, and interactive elements

issues.description: Missing semantic HTML5 elements
issues.impact: Reduces accessibility and SEO effectiveness
issues.suggested_fix: Use <nav>, <main>, <article>, <aside> instead of generic <div>

issues.description: Form inputs may be missing associated labels
issues.impact: Screen readers cannot identify form fields
issues.suggested_fix: Ensure all <input> elements have associated <label> with 'for' attribute

issues.description: Missing skip navigation link
issues.impact: Keyboard users must tab through all navigation on every page
issues.suggested_fix: Add 'Skip to main content' link at top of page

issues.description: Color contrast may not meet WCAG AA standards
issues.impact: Users with visual impairments may not be able to read text
issues.suggested_fix: Audit and adjust color palette to meet WCAG 2.1 AA (4.5:1 contrast ratio)

issues.description: Missing API documentation section
issues.impact: Developers don't know how to use the web API
issues.suggested_fix: Add API endpoints documentation with examples

issues.description: No architecture documentation (diagrams, system design)
issues.impact: New contributors struggle to understand codebase structure
issues.suggested_fix: Create architecture.md with component diagrams

issues.description: PowerShell scripts have minimal inline comments
issues.impact: Windows users may not understand complex script logic
issues.suggested_fix: Add comment-based help and inline explanations

issues.description: Missing troubleshooting section
issues.impact: Users waste time debugging common issues
issues.suggested_fix: Add FAQ/Troubleshooting section with common issues and solutions

issues.description: No contributing guidelines for code style
issues.impact: Contributors may submit code not matching project conventions
issues.suggested_fix: Add CONTRIBUTING.md with code style, testing, and PR guidelines

issues.description: Utility modules lack usage examples
issues.impact: Developers don't know how to use utility functions
issues.suggested_fix: Add docstring examples using doctest format

issues.description: Installers lack detailed error messages
issues.impact: Users get stuck during installation without knowing why
issues.suggested_fix: Add informative error messages with solutions

issues.description: No response caching for static API responses
issues.impact: Repeated API calls generate unnecessary computation
issues.suggested_fix: Implement Flask-Caching for appropriate endpoints

issues.description: File operations may not use buffering efficiently
issues.impact: Large file generation may be slow
issues.suggested_fix: Review and optimize file I/O patterns

issues.description: Directory scanning may not use efficient algorithms
issues.impact: Large repositories may take long to analyze
issues.suggested_fix: Add depth limits, use generators, implement caching

issues.description: CSS/JS assets not minified
issues.impact: Slower page load times
issues.suggested_fix: Add build step to minify assets

issues.description: Dependencies without version pinning
issues.impact: Potential for breaking changes from dependency updates
issues.suggested_fix: Pin all dependencies to specific versions or ranges

issues.description: No .editorconfig file
issues.impact: Inconsistent code formatting across different editors
issues.suggested_fix: Add .editorconfig with project formatting rules

issues.description: No CI/CD workflows for automated testing
issues.impact: Manual testing required, no automated quality checks
issues.suggested_fix: Add GitHub Actions for testing, linting, and deployment
